titleStmt.title: A true relation of the late battell fought in New England, between the English, and the salvages vvith the present state of things there.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Philip, b. 1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[armaduke] P[arsons] for Nathanael Butter, and Iohn Bellamie,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Running title reads: A battell in New England.
A variant (STC 24759) is dated 1638 and has changes in the title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
